dc:title: Tribute to the Nelsons
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Praises the dedicated work of Wally and Juanita Nelson for peace, conscientious objection, and tax resistance. Notes their willingness to be jailed and to fast for their convictions. Calls the undeclared Vietnam war "this hideous struggle."
